message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to let you take more than half. Let's work together to find a fair solution.
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
I'm trying to be fair here, Bob. This is the best I can do.  We need to reach an agreement before the inflation eats away at our gains!
